title: WHERES 3's
body: Its 3's time, we only get 2 days a week, I need my fucking fix mannnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn

replies.body: We're currently investigating why the queue isn't showing up at the moment. I'll get back to you here as soon as I can.
Jesus bit of disruption at Riot HQ today hey? Don't think I've ever seen this many issues in one day

OK, it looks like we've managed to fix the ghost infestation that travelled from the Twisted Treeline to Valoran Park, and both modes should now be up and running!

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
It seems like flex rules broke along with this. Two of us (d5) can't queue with our friend (p5) since the patch it. We just get [this](http://puu.sh/xzrNF/2e9e577ae2.png) error message.
it has been an hour :( i should be halfway to finding a game by now
It's probably because of literally so many people playing Invasion or Onslaught that queue times are 1 second, that Riot think that no-one will play 3s while the event is on.

Buuuump.

like legit 90% of the reason i'm playing League atm, to play 3's with a friend T_T
I log in for decay games once per day and for the full 3's session on thursdays and fridays. 3's FOR LIFE. The community is too stronk
